validation.max-length-number: The maximum length for this field is {{count}} numbers.
validation.max-length-string: The maximum length for this field is {{count}} characters.
validation.id-rule: {{name}} ID must start with a letter or number and only contain letters, numbers, or '-'
validation.experiment-running-warning: Changing variations may affect the accuracy of the experiment.
validation.experiment-running-warning-desc: To maintain the integrity and accuracy of experiment results, you cannot add, delete, or modify variation values while the experiment is running.

operation.later-than-current-time: This must be later than the current time.
operation.date-increasing-order: The date must be in increasing order.
operation.schedule-interval: The scheduled time interval must be at least 5 minutes apart.
operation.schedules-same-time: You cannot have multiple schedules at the same date and time.
operation.increments-greater-than: Increments must be greater than or equal to 1
operation.increments-less-than: Increments must be less than or equal to 100

validation.later-or-equal-days: This must be later than or equal to {{count}} days ago.
validation.less-or-equal-days: This must be less than or equals to {{count}} days.
validation.stop-later-than-start: Stop at must be later than the start at.
validation.name-at-least-characters: The {{name}} you have provided must have at least {{count}} characters

copy-trigger-url: Copy and store this URL. Once you leave this page, the URL will be hidden.

operation.must-be-greater-value: {{name}} must be greater than or equal to {{value}}
operation.must-be-less-value: {{name}} must be less than or equal to {{value}}

empty.experiment-match: No experiments match your search filters. Try changing your filters.

max-size-file: The maximum size of the file is {{size}}MB
format-file-not-supported: The file format is not supported
could-not-find-page: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.
could-not-find-filter: We couldn't find what you're looking for
try-again-later: We're on it. Please try again later.
auth-context-error: useAuth must be used within an AuthProvider
empty-segment: No segments found. Please <comp>create</comp> a segment first.
not-has-permission-create-demo: You do not have permission to create a Demo organization.
required-agreement-terms: Agreement to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy is required to proceed.
